name: Grumpy Gus
response: Grumpy Gus is no ordinary troll—he’s the kind of guy who snacks like it's a marathon, not a sprint. Steady consumption? Yeah, he'll take it slow and steady, thank you very much. Insurance? Gus doesn’t see the harm in it—sure, maybe it’s not sacred, but a grunt or two of approval? Absolutely. Pharma? Well, it exists, so that’s good enough for him. No need to get all worked up about it—he’ll just shrug, scratch his head, and move on. But Crypto? Ah, crypto stirs an old irritation in Gus, like a pebble in his shoe he can’t quite shake. He’ll grumble low in his throat at the mention of it—sour grapes, much? Either way, you’d best not bring up the blockchain around him unless you’re ready for a lecture on why it’s all just a passing fad.
